casebody.data:
Nicholas MALLIS, Appellant,
v.
PALERMO AT THE COLONY CONDOMINIUM ASSOCIATION, INC. and Reemployment Assistance Appeals Commission, Appellees. No. 1D18-798 District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District. January 16, 2019
